attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to get The Prime Minister to allow my 2 year old stateless daughter and my mom entry into the UK, after being forced to flee Zimbabwe. The government have refused visa applications for both of them and British citizenship to my stateless daughter, even though my Dad was born in the UK and is a citizen of the country, as am I. I appreciate all of you that are signing this petition and pledging your support.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
